prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Bass, Reed, Piano, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Reed, Drums, and Bass, but no Guitar.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Drums, Bass, Reed, and Piano, but no Guitar.

Style 3:
Guitar is absent from this song, which instead includes Piano, Reed, Drums, and Bass.
